info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 8:02PM EDT until March 31 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern St. Joseph County in southwestern Michigan... Branch County in southwestern Michigan... Northwestern Hillsdale County in southeastern Michigan... * Until 845 PM EDT. * At 801 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sturgis, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. A trained spotter reported quarter sized hail in Sturgis Michigan at 752 PM EDT. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Sturgis, Coldwater, Bronson, Jonesville, Quincy, Litchfield, Girard, Fawn River, Batavia, Burr Oak, Gilead, Allen, South Butler, Matteson Lake, Marble Lake, Lake Of The Woods, Hodunk and Coldwater Lake. This includes Interstate 69 in Michigan between mile markers 5 and 21. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
